page.title: 14RAILWAY PRESERVATION SOCIETY
page.content: This society supports,raises money for and provides voluntary labour for the 'La'al Ratty'(the Ravenglass & Eskdale Railway).It helps to run the cafe,the gift shop,provides guards and ticket collectors and helps with engine and coach maintainance.The 'Ratty'employs 16 people fulltime and builds and renovates engines for other companies. In 1985 the'Ratty'was Highly Commended on its station restoration using material from the old Whitehaven station and was voted Independent Rail way of the Year.The society owns some shares in the'Ratty'and the engine,the River Mite.The secretary is Mr.David Webb of 29 Cedar Lane,Cockermouth from whom membership details can be obtained.
